Interface YahtzeeConstants

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Yahtzee, YahtzeeDisplay

    public interface YahtzeeConstants
    File: YahtzeeConstants.java --------------------------- This file declares several constants that are shared by the different modules in the Yahtzee game.
